fields.description:
An instance profile can be specified when running an instance. If the instance profile is invalid then the request fails with an error that is not useful. The following example is SOAP, but this would also occur with the Query API:

{code}
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ns:RunInstances>
         <ns:imageId>emi-BCEC3A20</ns:imageId>
         <ns:minCount>1</ns:minCount>
         <ns:maxCount>1</ns:maxCount>
         <ns:iamInstanceProfile>
            <ns:arn>arn:aws:iam::192263603329:instance-profile/Invalid</ns:arn>      	  
            <ns:name>Invalid</ns:name>        
         </ns:iamInstanceProfile>        
      </ns:RunInstances>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
{code}

The response for this is:

{code}
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soapenv:Body>
      <soapenv:Fault>
         <faultcode>RunInstancesType</faultcode>
         <faultstring>Failed to lookup vm instance: VmInstance:networkConfig=VmNetworkConfig:usePrivateAddressing=false:macAddress=d0:0d:C0:EF:41:5C:privateAddress=0.0.0.0:publicAddress=0.0.0.0:privateDnsName=euca-0-0-0-0.eucalyptus.internal:publicDnsName=euca-0-0-0-0.eucalyptus.localhost:vmId=VmId:reservationId=r-7876412D:instanceId=i-C0EF415CnameOrArn= arn:aws:iam::192263603329:instance-profile/Invalid:bootRecord=VmBootRecord:machineImage=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/emi-BCEC3A20/:kernel=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/eki-71363D75/:ramdisk=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/eri-0AD83F35/:platform=linux:persistentVolumes=[]:sshKeyPair=:vmType=VmType m1.small cores=1 disk=5 mem=256:usageStats=VmUsageStats:blockBytes=0:networkBytes=0:launchRecord=VmLaunchRecord:launchIndex=0:launchTime=Thu May 23 22:34:39 PDT 2013:runtimeState=VmRuntimeState:reason=:reasonDetails=[]:consoleOutput=::transientVolumeState=VmVolumeState:attachments=[]:placement=VmPlacement:clusterName=CC_31:partitionName=PARTI00:privateNetwork=false:networkGroups=[NetworkRulesGroup:192263603329:default:description=default group:networkRules=[]]:networkIndex=PrivateNetworkIndex:default tag=584 idx=10</faultstring>
         <detail>Failed to lookup vm instance: VmInstance:networkConfig=VmNetworkConfig:usePrivateAddressing=false:macAddress=d0:0d:C0:EF:41:5C:privateAddress=0.0.0.0:publicAddress=0.0.0.0:privateDnsName=euca-0-0-0-0.eucalyptus.internal:publicDnsName=euca-0-0-0-0.eucalyptus.localhost:vmId=VmId:reservationId=r-7876412D:instanceId=i-C0EF415CnameOrArn= arn:aws:iam::192263603329:instance-profile/Invalid:bootRecord=VmBootRecord:machineImage=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/emi-BCEC3A20/:kernel=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/eki-71363D75/:ramdisk=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:192263603329:image/eri-0AD83F35/:platform=linux:persistentVolumes=[]:sshKeyPair=:vmType=VmType m1.small cores=1 disk=5 mem=256:usageStats=VmUsageStats:blockBytes=0:networkBytes=0:launchRecord=VmLaunchRecord:launchIndex=0:launchTime=Thu May 23 22:34:39 PDT 2013:runtimeState=VmRuntimeState:reason=:reasonDetails=[]:consoleOutput=::transientVolumeState=VmVolumeState:attachments=[]:placement=VmPlacement:clusterName=CC_31:partitionName=PARTI00:privateNetwork=false:networkGroups=[NetworkRulesGroup:192263603329:default:description=default group:networkRules=[]]:networkIndex=PrivateNetworkIndex:default tag=584 idx=10</detail>
      </soapenv:Fault>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
{code}

We should check the AWS error code/message and have a compatible error.
fields.summary: Improve error for invalid instance profile when running instance
